resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text:
Matthew the angel.
The nimbus and the wings can confirm this is a representation of the four living creatures.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Conspicuus resides sublimi sede Redemptor (Made visible, you stand on your sublime seat, Redeemer).
resource.chars: Conspicuus resides sublimi sede Redemptor (Made visible, you stand on your sublime seat, Redeemer).

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The Christ seems younger on this painting, but the cruciform nimbus is enough to confirm his identity.
